data.message:
Can you please change back the messenger button that you moved to the left upper corner where it was before, down to the middle?
Everybody hates this change that you recently did. 
It is SOOOOO UNCOMFORTABLE !  Thank you !

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Alexandra. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2e1UXLI. -Jessica
Facebook  She is so right ! Everyone hates this change !
Facebook yes she is right everyone hate this change
Also the " Friend requests " button should be back to the left lower corner !
She is so right ! Everyone hates this change !
Sometimes, Facebook just changes things up to make us think they're still breathing . . . not that the changes are better!

Does any of these really help to make a change ? I have me sager messages and my me sager never works so I never get them except for numbers of how many I have ? But to go to it to retrive them it all ways tells me me sager is not responding :(
nag aaral ako po ganase zamboanga del norte
fb can you see my messages (messenger) for you? Please help me ..
